"Very good people and ezy to get long with them very Honest Company high quality "Couldn't be happier with the great customer service and the final product." "We can not wait until this Spring when we are floating in our backyard oasis!!!"
Called for a part i couldn't find anywhere else. They had a used one and offered it to me for free. Worked perfectly.  10 out of 10. They have my business moving forward.
“Alex Bowers” did a terrible job on my pool. Would give zero stars if I could. The guy needs to be fired

Claffey did a wonderful job building our dream pool and oasis. They blew us away with their design and the finished product turned out better than we could have dreamed of. I highly recommend Claffey.
